page.title: 16CRAIG'S DAY AT SCHOOL
page.content: Our school day begins at 9.00 a.m.but usually we arrive at school about 15 minutes earlier to play football or cricket in the playground. When the bell rings we go into school and the first thing that is done is that the register is marked to see who is absent and who is staying for dinner at school. We have assembly in the hall until about half past nine and then we go into the classroom to do our work. We usually start off with Maths. We have playtime at 10.35 until 10.50 a.m. then we work again in the classroom. We do other subjects like English, History,Geography, Science,Music,Art P.E. Religious Education, Music and Games. We have dinner between 12.00 and 1.15p.m and go home at 3.45 p.m.but the infants leave half an hour earlier
